pull.title: [wallet] remove redundant KeyOriginInfo access, already done in CreateSig
pull.body: This redundancy is confusing as it looks like pubkeyhashes are special in some way based on where it's called.

events.message: remove redundant KeyOriginInfo access, already done in CreateSig

events.body: Is this redundant for all possible code paths that lead to `GetPubKey`?
@laanwj It's the only instance of it, yes.

so this is `SignStep` that calls `GetPubKey` then `CreateSig`?
I see, utACK https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/14678/commits/f7beb95a1f921ed292680fbd2f042b4bac73bf59
made `sigdata` const to make the intention of function clearer
